Class Shader

java.lang.Object
fr.florian.engine.graphics.Shader
public class Shader extends Object
Manages an OpenGL shader program composed of a vertex and fragment shader. Handles compilation, linking, binding, and uniform uploading.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Shader(String vertexPath, String fragmentPath)
    Loads shader source code from specified files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    bind()
    Activates the shader program for rendering.
    void
    create()
    Compiles the vertex and fragment shaders and links them into a shader program.
    void
    destroy()
    Deletes the shader program and its attached shaders from the GPU.
    int
    getUniformLocation(String name)
    Gets the location of a uniform variable in the shader.
    void
    setUniform(String name, boolean value)
    Uploads a boolean uniform to the shader (as integer).
    void
    setUniform(String name, float value)
    Uploads a float uniform to the shader.
    void
    setUniform(String name, int value)
    Uploads an int uniform to the shader.
    void
    setUniform(String name, Matrix4f value)
    Uploads a 4x4 matrix uniform to the shader.
    void
    setUniform(String name, Vector2f value)
    Uploads a 2D vector uniform to the shader.
    void
    setUniform(String name, Vector3f value)
    Uploads a 3D vector uniform to the shader.
    void
    unbind()
    Deactivates the shader program.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shader

      public Shader(String vertexPath, String fragmentPath)
      Loads shader source code from specified files.
      Parameters:
      vertexPath - Path to the vertex shader file.
      fragmentPath - Path to the fragment shader file.

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create()
      Compiles the vertex and fragment shaders and links them into a shader program. Prints errors to stderr if compilation or linking fails.

    • getUniformLocation

      public int getUniformLocation(String name)
      Gets the location of a uniform variable in the shader.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the uniform.
      Returns:
      The uniform's location ID.

    • setUniform

      public void setUniform(String name, float value)
      Uploads a float uniform to the shader.

    • setUniform

      public void setUniform(String name, int value)
      Uploads an int uniform to the shader.

    • setUniform

      public void setUniform(String name, boolean value)
      Uploads a boolean uniform to the shader (as integer).

    • setUniform

      public void setUniform(String name, Vector2f value)
      Uploads a 2D vector uniform to the shader.

    • setUniform

      public void setUniform(String name, Vector3f value)
      Uploads a 3D vector uniform to the shader.

    • setUniform

      public void setUniform(String name, Matrix4f value)
      Uploads a 4x4 matrix uniform to the shader.

    • bind

      public void bind()
      Activates the shader program for rendering.

    • unbind

      public void unbind()
      Deactivates the shader program.

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Deletes the shader program and its attached shaders from the GPU.
